name: 郭天穎
objective:
本課程介紹各種常用之進階影像處理理論，課程內容含蓋：
１. 空間域影像強化
２. 頻域影像強化
３. 影像還原
４. 彩色影像處理
５. 型態學影像處理
６.影像分割
7. 物件辨認
8. 小波理論
schedule:
week1　　Introduction
week2-3　　Digital Image Fundamentals
week4-5　　Image Enhancement in Spatial Domain
week6-8　　Image Enhancement in Frequency Domain
week9-10　　Morphological Image Processing
week11-12　　Image Segmentation
week13-14　　Image Restoration
week15-16　　Color Image Processing
week17   Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing
week17(maybe)Image Compression
week18 Final Prject
materials:
Textbook:
(1) Gonzales & Woods: Digital Image Processing, Addison Wisley, 3rd Ed, 2010
(2) Handout
References:
